Living Room: Starting location. Where the player can find the scratch post and yarn ball.
Enchanted Garden: Where the player can find the magic hat and collect fairy dust.
Mouse Hole: Where Nibbles mouse can be found to obtain the flytrap.
Jerry's Hideout: Where the player must go to save Jerry mouse from the flies.
Fly-infested Kitchen: Where the player must use the fairy dust and magic hat to repel and catch flies.
Fairytopia Square: Where the player can return after completing the quest and celebrate victory with Jerry and the fairytopia citizens.
